content.en: Algorithmic Optimization: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can optimize various aspects of 3D printing processes. They are using machine learning methods, such as experimental sampling, data clustering, and classification, to determine the optimal operating process window in aerosol jet 3D printing. Other algorithms, like response surface methodology–genetic algorithm (RSM–GA) and artificial neural network (ANN), are being used to optimize significant process parameters and improve surface roughness in different types of 3D printing. These algorithms are helping to enhance the overall printing quality, dimensional accuracy, mechanical properties, and producibility of 3D printed parts.
content.da: Algoritmisk optimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan optimere forskellige aspekter af 3D-printprocesser. De bruger maskinlæringsmetoder, såsom eksperimentel sampling, dataklyngedannelse og klassifikation, for at bestemme det optimale driftsvindue i aerosol jet 3D-printning. Andre algoritmer, som responsflademetodologi-genetisk algoritme (RSM–GA) og kunstigt neuralt netværk (ANN), anvendes til at optimere betydelige procesparametre og forbedre overfladeruheden i forskellige typer af 3D-printning. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at forbedre den overordnede printkvalitet, dimensionelle nøjagtighed, mekaniske egenskaber og producerbarheden af 3D-printede dele.
